title: Curious George (Captioned)
brief_description: George, that irrepressible monkey, is living happily in the jungle when he is discovered by the man in the yellow hat and whisked off on a series of adventures on land and sea. George’s curiosity gets him into a lot of trouble, but produces many laughs along the way.
